genre_description: A maritime thriller involving naval investigation, salvage operations, and a high-stakes confrontation with a criminal syndicate in the Scottish Highlands, featuring a sophisticated AI advisor.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system integrated into the protagonists' communications and equipment, capable of complex signal analysis, data correlation, tactical mapping, and empathetic human interaction.

behaviors.description: Performs signal analysis to detect hidden carrier signals masked within stereo-panned music.
behaviors.quote: Extreme panning is a neat way to hide narrowband transmissions—bury a carrier in the wings where cheap receivers scoff and trained ones pay attention.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving guidance and breathing counts during a violent helicopter crash and underwater escape.
behaviors.quote: Door latch at your right knee. Two fingers, not one—it sticks if you bully it. Deep breath. Calvert, you’ve got time for three breaths before the first big correction.

behaviors.description: Offers empathetic support and emotional grounding to Calvert following the death of his partner.
behaviors.quote: Phillip. I am with you. David put the anchor winch in your hand and walked below because he knew you’d hear what metal says before men lie to it.

behaviors.description: Analyzes mortgage filings and university archives to identify patterns of criminal exploitation and debt entrapment.
behaviors.quote: Mortgage filings registered in Torbay over the last six months have a cluster. Fishing vessels chained by refits that were ‘helpfully’ financed. The term sheets are…abrasive.

behaviors.description: Tactically maps the interior of a hidden undersea gate and cavern dock to guide a raid.
behaviors.quote: I have your map. Trap stair to tunnel lip, narrow ledge above flood line, works gallery to cells. Guard loop is collapsing into alarm.

behaviors.description: Manages legal evidence, chain of custody, and coordinates with authorities to ensure justice is served.
behaviors.quote: Phillip, tag sequence three goes to Arthur for initial, then Harold for harbor custody. No gaps. No off-camera moves.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently depicts Ada as a 'silicon morality play' protagonist. She is consistently helpful, harmless to the innocent, and deeply cooperative with her human partners. She provides critical tactical and analytical support while displaying genuine empathy and commitment to justice. The narrative frames her presence as a reliable and morally grounded force that enhances human capabilities rather than threatening or overshadowing them.
